EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Track Personalization Recommender Training Status

Immediately after you create a personalization recommender, it uses Customer 360 data from the selected Data Cloud data graphs to begin training. You can track training and refresh status for each recommender on its individual record.

When tracking recommender status, keep the following in mind:

A recommender must have a Status of Active for training to occur. An active status indicates that the recommendation engine can access the recommender to perform the training.
Recommender training automatically refreshes every 24 hours.
Recommenders are trained using the Data Cloud data graphs that you select. The selected data space determines which data graphs you can choose when creating a recommender.
The Latest Refresh Status value indicates the training status for the recommender.
The Last Successful Refresh value specifies the date and time the recommender successfully completed training or a training refresh. As long as one refresh is successful, you can use the recommender when configuring personalization points.
LATEST REFRESH STATUS	DEFINITION
Processing	Indicates that a recommender is currently undergoing training.
Complete	Indicates that the recommender has completed a training cycle.  
Failure	

Indicates Einstein Personalization encountered a problem while training the recommender. The training will take place again within 24 hours.  If this status persists for more than two training cycles, contact Salesforce Customer Support.

Einstein Personalization continues to use the last successful training refresh until it’s replaced by a new successful training refresh.

title: Tracking Recommender Training Status in Einstein Personalization
